chapters.description: This chapter delves into distinguishing between trends and fads, analyzing the statics of trends, understanding the diffusion of innovation, illustrating the Rogers Bell Curve's role in innovation adoption, identifying tipping points, and discussing the three agents of change that influence societal shifts.
